titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Secretary's Office, Yale University, Records Concerning Labor Relations
Secretary's Office, Yale University, Records Concerning Labor Relations
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:27

did.unittitle: Secretary's office, Yale University, records concerning labor relations

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, drafts of statements, meeting files, and related materials concerning labor relations at Yale University.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of the Secretary

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 4-A (YRG 4-A), Records of the Yale secretary's office.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Office of the Secretary, 1978 and 1988.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Secretary's Office, Yale University, Records Concerning Labor Relations (RU 54). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, drafts of statements, meeting files, and related materials concerning labor relations at Yale University.

Labor disputes
